description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. An evil witch kidnaps a pretty fit girl out of jealousy.  Play as the girl and fight through the witch's minions.  If her minions don't stop you, she will!
description.short: An evil witch kidnaps a pretty fit girl out of jealousy.  Play as the girl and fight through the witch's minions.  If her minions don't stop you, she will!
